reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of good quality, soft, and comfortable, with one noting it feels like a nice old crocheted blanket.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Fit is true to size. Very warm to wear, not made out of itchy material. Not sure how it will hold up with washing and drying over time. But it‚Äôs a beautiful cardigan Read more
items.author: Trevor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Orange (not red) and Fabulous!
items.body: This is a fabulous sweater!! It's soft, light weight but has a cozy feel, well made, great length, and has pockets! It's listed as "red," but the photo looks orange/coral so I took a chance. It is the most beautiful color, a soft orange, more like coral - - it's great! Read more
items.author: CharlotteReads

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and cozy sweater
items.body: Soft sweater. Quality is great. True to size. Love this sweater Read more
items.author: donna phillips

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Staple Sweater
items.body: Love love love the huge array of colors offered. I also bought one of these sweaters in black. I knew I would regret buying a size too large (2X) and it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm tall 5‚Äô10‚Äù sz 14-16, when it‚Äôs clearly apparent this IS already a slightly oversized sweater. But it‚Äôs a must have in your wardrobe because of the great style, colors and price & all the styling details you see here: smooth collar edge, cabling stitch design, flat pockets on the front not the side or hip (which is usually unflattering), and it‚Äôs super soft and not heavy like other sweaters I‚Äôve had from Amazon. Due to its acrylic not cotton. The only detail I didn‚Äôt particularly like was the side-slit only because I‚Äôm overweight at my hips n butt the last few years (menopause weight gain, I used to wear a 10-12) and that slit isn‚Äôt flattering when I walk. So ladies if you have a pear figure like me keep that in mind. However, bottomline, ***purchase according to your true clothes size***. I can‚Äôt emphasize this enough Enjoy the colors & buy more than one ladies! Read more
items.author: Tracey Wagner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall cardigan üçÅ
items.body: Love the color of this cardigan‚Äîthe burnt orange is absolutely perfect. It‚Äôs warm and really comfortable, but it does stretch out a bit throughout the day. Still a great piece overall and super easy to layer. Read more
items.author: MissSweetTeaSpillsTheTea

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but not very functional
items.body: Beautiful, warm and soft. BUT‚Ä¶I could only give it 3 stars because the weave is so loose that it snags on EVERYTHING, ALL. THE. TIME. And as a result, pulls long pieces of yarn out of the weave that you have to tuck in and pull through the underside so they don‚Äôt show. I would not recommend it for this reason. Also, the pockets are made weird so they hang inside funny and show. Read more
items.author: midwest wifey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater!
items.body: Very nice sweater! Weight is awesome for those chilly winter days at home. Fit was perfect ( I ordered a small) Value for the money is spot on! Very happy with purchase! Read more
items.author: Debra Stapleton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft, nice thickness/weight & fits as expected.
items.body: Super soft. Nice thickness/weight. I bought my normal size large & it fits oversized as expected. I bought it to go over a Halloween shirt‚Ä¶it‚Äôs kind of an odd orange color‚Ä¶but it ironically matches the orange on my shirt. I bought it for a special 22$ & it went up in price 10$ the next day. Read more
items.author: Jill M.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Gray, Rust, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Mineral Red, Red, Navy, Khaki, Beige, Purple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
